metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

Migrate Classic Application Insights to Log Analytic Workspace which is retiring by 29 Febraury 2024. Use 'Log Analytic Workspace-->Properties' blade having 'Resource ID' property value. This is a fully qualified resourceId which is in format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/{workspaceName}'

metadata.title: Extract Domain from URL
metadata.description: Given a URL, this function will extract the proper domain.

body.message:
DomainTools IRIS Enrich response for: @{variables('domain_name')}
@{body('Domain_detailts_Table')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Components_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }@{body('miscellaneouos_Table')}@{body('IP_Table')}@{body('MX_Table')}@{body('Nameserver_Table')}@{body('Admin_Contact_Table')}@{body('Billing_Contact_Table')}@{body('Registrant_Contact_Table')}@{body('Technical_Contact_Table')}
Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}
No results found for: @{variables('domain_name')}

metadata.title: Domain Enrichment - DomainTools Iris Enrich
metadata.description: The DomainTools Iris Enrich API is more suited to high-volume API lookups than Iris Investigate and is able to provide domain infrastructure information for a domain or set of domains associated with an incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Enrich. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DomainTools IRIS Investigate response for:@{variables('domain_name')}
@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_detailts_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Components_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }@{replace(replace(replace(body('miscellaneouos_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('IP_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('MX_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Nameserver_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('SSL_Info_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Admin_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Billing_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Registrant_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Technical_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}


Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}
No results found for: @{variables('domain_name')}

metadata.title: Domain Enrichment - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident return all Iris Investigate data for those domains as comments in the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DomainTools Risk Score details for: @{variables('domain_name')} : @{variables('domain_risk_score')}
Domain Risk Components: @{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }

Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}
No results found for: @{variables('domain_name')}

metadata.title: Domain Risk Score - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident return the risk scores and adjust the severity of the incident if a high risk domain is observed, adding the risk details in the comments of the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

metadata.title: Guided Pivots - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain return all the Iris Investigate data, highlighting fields where < 200 domains share an attribute to clue investigators in to retrieve more data via Iris Investigate UI (or further queries using the Iris Investigate API).
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message: Malicious Tags found in:@{body('Malicious_Domains_Table')}

metadata.title: Malicious Tags - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Track the activities of malicious actors using the Iris Investigate UI, tagging domains of interest. Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident, query Iris Investigate for information on those domains, and if a specified set of tags is observed, mark the incident as 'severe' Microsoft Sentinel and add a comment.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DomainTools IRIS Investigate response for: @{variables('domain_name')}
@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_detailts_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Components_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }@{replace(replace(replace(body('miscellaneouos_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('IP_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('MX_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Nameserver_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('SSL_Info_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Admin_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Billing_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Registrant_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Technical_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}


Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}
No results found for @{variables('domain_name')}

metadata.title: URL Enrichment- DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a URL or set of URLs associated with an incident return all Iris Investigate data for the extracted domains from the URL as comments in the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DomainTools IRIS Investigate response for: @{variables('domain_name')}
@{body('Domain_detailts_Table')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Components_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }@{body('miscellaneouos_Table')}@{body('IP_Table')}@{body('MX_Table')}@{body('Nameserver_Table')}@{body('Admin_Contact_Table')}@{body('Billing_Contact_Table')}@{body('Registrant_Contact_Table')}@{body('Technical_Contact_Table')}
Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}

Farsight DNSDB RData Reuslts for: @{variables('domain_name')}
@{variables('dnsdb_results_string')}
@{replace(replace(replace(body('DNSDB_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '')}
Find more details: https://scout.dnsdb.info/?seed=@{variables('domain_name')}
No results found for @{variables('domain_name')}

metadata.title: Domain Enrichment- DomainTools Iris Investigate With Farsight DNSDB
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident, enrich the domain using the DomainTools Iris Investigate API, returning whois and infrastructure details. Subsequently retrieve associated subdomains from passive DNS information seen in Farsights DNSDB.
prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.
A Farisght API Key provisioned for Farsight DNSDB. Visit https://www.farsightsecurity.com/about-farsight-security/contacts/ to request a trial key

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Domaintools Iris investigate solution for Microsoft Sentinel contains Playbooks that can help Enrich domain & investigate domain, domain risk score, Malicious tags, URL's and DNS from Domain tools. This enriched / investigated information can help drive better analysis in security Operations.

Function Apps: 1, Playbooks: 7

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
